blog.name: reasonstolovebex
blog.title: Reasons To Love Bex.
blog.description: Just a teenage girl who has a gay crush on Bex. Also this page is filled with reasons to Love Bex Mack because there are TONS of reasons.

summary: Now Bex comes out to Andi because we are all just a gay mess
body:
Now Bex comes out to Andi because we are all just a gay mess

Andi: So Cyrus just spilt the tea about you….

Bex: Huh? Tea?? Is there a tea flavor called Bex because if there is, it must be a very underrated but really good tea.

Andi: haha noooo. Tea as in he told me something like a secret.

Bex: oh….. what is it?

Andi: your bisexual… is that true?

Bex: Oh. Um…

Andi: IT IS!!!!!!

Bex: I never said yes!!!!

Andi: you never said no. You also said “Um”

Bex: At least I didn’t ask for pizza this time…

Andi: haha. But why didn’t you tell me?

Bex: I guess I never thought about it… I guess I kinda thought everyone already knew? If that makes sense. But I still love bowie… a lot!!

Andi: It does! I mean I’m Pan… I guess I never told you that… or anyone… wow that’s weird. And yes bisexual doesn’t just mean you like girls. I know you still love him.

Bex: Oh my god.

Andi: what?

Bex: I love you. *hugs Andi*

Andi: *smiles* love you too mom. Man Cyrus was right. Your so easy to talk too…

blog.name: reasonstolovebex
blog.title: Reasons To Love Bex.
blog.description: Just a teenage girl who has a gay crush on Bex. Also this page is filled with reasons to Love Bex Mack because there are TONS of reasons.

summary: Now Tj comes out to Bex because UWU
body:
Now Tj comes out to Bex because UWU

Tj: Hey I know we never met but I heard your cool and your really easy to talk to, but I’m gay and I need advice.

Bex: Wow. Okay. What’s up?

Tj: I like this guy….

Bex: ASK HIM OUT!!!!!!!!!

Tj: It’s not that easy…. I don’t even think he knows I’m gay and I don’t even know if he likes guys!!!!

Bex: well… what’s his name? I might know…. I have a kid who goes to your school.

Tj: No no. I know you might know him and I don’t want to say his name.

Bex: well okay… describe him then!

Tj: Well he’s cute *blushes* and very sweet and is kinda weird, BUT in a good way! He also loves to wear button up shirts, mostly plaid…. but that’s all I’m giving you….

Bex: ASK HIM OU- …. I mean, he’s definitely gay.

Tj: How do you know?

Bex: I just know!!

tags: something to think during the everlasting hiatus
summary: THOUGHTS ON ONE SIGNIFICANT PARA||EL: I've rewatched a couple of episodes lately and what struck me in the season 2 finale is...
caption:
THOUGHTS ON ONE SIGNIFICANT PARA||EL:

I’ve rewatched a couple of episodes lately and what struck me in the season 2 finale is that we might be getting a parallel to THIS [gif] (with Cyrus this time running towards TJ, duh), since we know there’s a basketball game later in the season, and we all know how much Terri loves parallels.

Thoughts?

blog.name: reasonstolovebex
blog.title: Reasons To Love Bex.
blog.description: Just a teenage girl who has a gay crush on Bex. Also this page is filled with reasons to Love Bex Mack because there are TONS of reasons.

summary: Cyrus coming out to Bex and her reaction:
body:
Cyrus coming out to Bex and her reaction:

Cyrus: Hey Bex. Your the first adult I’m telling this about… but I’m gay.

Bex: Cool. I’m bisexual.

Cyrus: wait what?

Bex: oh. Well I guess your the first person I’m telling this about.

Cyrus: Well I feel honored.

Bex: Anyways, it’s cool. Your gay, I’m bisexual, we are still Cyrus and Bex. We are no different. We’re cool bro… wait do people still say that?

Cyrus: *smiles* you make everything seem so chill an cool. thanks Bex. *hugs her* and I still say bro!

blog.name: tyrusoldme-am-spoilers
blog.title: Theodore James is the ONLY correct answer

summary: do you have anymore science facts?
question: do you have anymore science facts?
answer:
UGH YES ALWAYS !!!! Here’s some more because I love science:

- Spray perfume lightly in your hair OR right after you shower- it’ll last longer

- During the summer wear lighter colors because it’ll keep you cooler

- I know you always see “stay frozen and a bee won’t sting” which is true but not 100% true !! Bees are similar to dogs in the sense that if you walk slowly by it and don’t give it any attention it won’t chase you

- Feeling hot outside while wearing full sleeves ?? Don’t roll them up. Drink cold water. Water will cool down your system, keep you hydrated- preventing heat stroke, and keeping your sleeves down prevents excessive UV exposure

- If your hands are cold and you’re near a sink wash your hands with freezing cold water- your body will detect below average temperatures and warm up your hands as an attempt to balance your overall body temperature

- Try to find chapstick that has SPF protection !!!! A lot of cases of skin cancer start in the lips !!!!

- If you have an Apple device turn on night mode after 9 pm I’m serious- the blue light is dangerous when it gets dark and could cause weaker vision protect your eyes please I love you

- When you dry your face or your hair don’t dry it with a towel !!!! PLEASE a towel will cause frizzy, dry, weaker hair !!!! A towel will cause drier skin !!!! Also if your skin is prone to acne rubbing a towel over your face will make it so much WORSE

summary: Wait but wasn't eurydice attracted to orlheus's singing voice? Libby's deaf tho
question: Wait but wasn't eurydice attracted to orlheus's singing voice? Libby's deaf tho
answer: Lmao I think you’re right, but the musical I was referring to messes with the myth a bit and Eurydice is more so astonished by the fact that Orpheus’ music could bring back Spring (because she kinda starves during winter oof)
